instruction: Suggest a way to protect sensitive data that is being sent over the internet.
output: A way to protect sensitive data that is being sent over the internet is to use encryption. Encryption is an effective way to protect data as it converts data into a code that can only be read by those with the correct key. Additionally, using secure protocols such as Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) can also help keep data safe.
